name: A EYE (Bisho)
description:
A eye is a platformer shooting game playing by the words of the theme of 4th Wowie game jam(collaborate with ai).

Gameplay

you collaborate with the eye and use it as your weapon, technically speaking you do the moving and the eye does the fighting.

Controls

left: A

right: D

jump: space

aim: mouse

shoot: m1

interact: E

Credits

music: zapsplat.com, everything else: bisho (me)

social

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/GamingTodayBisho/about

this the first game I ever finished and the first jam I put an entry in, I hope everyone in the jam does have fun and for everyone to enjoy the game!
